column4: Excuse me, i need some help on ubuntu.When i login with my account it says $home cannot be written and is not owned by me and should be.Anyone know how i can fix it?
Excuse me, i need some help on ubuntu.When i login with my account it says $home cannot be written and is not owned by me and should be.Anyone know how i can fix it?
stop spamming please, you need to fix the permissions on your /home/username directory
